member.name: WS_VALUE_TYPE.WS_BOOL_VALUE_TYPE
member.summary: Used to indicate a BOOL value.

member.name: WS_VALUE_TYPE.WS_INT8_VALUE_TYPE
member.summary: Used to indicate a signed 8-bit integer.

member.name: WS_VALUE_TYPE.WS_INT16_VALUE_TYPE
member.summary: Used to indicate a signed 16-bit integer.

member.name: WS_VALUE_TYPE.WS_INT32_VALUE_TYPE
member.summary: Used to indicate a signed 32-bit integer.

member.name: WS_VALUE_TYPE.WS_INT64_VALUE_TYPE
member.summary: Used to indicate a signed 64-bit integer.

member.name: WS_VALUE_TYPE.WS_UINT8_VALUE_TYPE
member.summary: Used to indicate an unsigned 8-bit integer.

member.name: WS_VALUE_TYPE.WS_UINT16_VALUE_TYPE
member.summary: Used to indicate an unsigned 16-bit integer.

member.name: WS_VALUE_TYPE.WS_UINT32_VALUE_TYPE
member.summary: Used to indicate an unsigned 32-bit integer.

member.name: WS_VALUE_TYPE.WS_UINT64_VALUE_TYPE
member.summary: Used to indicate an unsigned 64-bit integer.

member.name: WS_VALUE_TYPE.WS_FLOAT_VALUE_TYPE
member.summary: Used to indicate a 32-bit floating point value.

member.name: WS_VALUE_TYPE.WS_DOUBLE_VALUE_TYPE
member.summary: Used to indicate a 64-bit floating point value.

member.name: WS_VALUE_TYPE.WS_DECIMAL_VALUE_TYPE
member.summary: Used to indicate a 96-bit fixed point value.

member.name: WS_VALUE_TYPE.WS_DATETIME_VALUE_TYPE
member.summary: Used to indicate a date and time.

member.name: WS_VALUE_TYPE.WS_TIMESPAN_VALUE_TYPE
member.summary: Used to indicate a signed 64-bit time period in 100 nanosecond units.
